summary: This document is an email chain from June 12, 2020, discussing a Jane Doe civil complaint related to the Epstein case. The emails contain internal commentary about inconsistencies in the complaint, including details about the victim's age when she met Epstein and descriptions of travel on Epstein's jet. The correspondence involves legal strategizing about what allegations to include.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: Referenced in the email as someone who took frequent flights on Epstein's jet alongside an unnamed victim (Jane Doe).

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain dated June 12, 2020, discussing a Jane Doe civil complaint against Epstein/Maxwell.
The emails note the complaint contains inconsistencies with incontrovertible facts, such as the victim's age when she met Epstein.
The complaint includes references to threats and frequent flights taken by both the victim and Maxwell on Epstein's jet.
The correspondence shows legal strategizing about including or omitting specific allegations, such as where the victim met Maxwell.
The identities of the email sender(s) and recipient(s) are redacted, indicating privileged legal or investigative communication.
